1st: "data"
01100100 01100001 01110100 01100001
2nd: " str"
00100000 01110011 01110100 01110010
3rd: "uctu"
01110101 01100011 01110100 01110101
4th: "re i"
01110010 01100101 00100000 01101001
5th: "s fu"
01110011 00100000 01100110 01110101
6th: "n"
01101110 10000000 00000000 00000000  

now, reverse everything:
1st:
01100001 01110100 01100001 01100100
1635017060
2nd:
01110010 01110100 01110011 00100000
1920234272
3rd:
01110101 01110100 01100011 01110101
1970561909
4th:
01101001 00100000 01100101 01110010
1763730802
5th:
01110101 01100110 00100000 01110011
1969627251
6th:
00000000 00000000 10000000 01101110
32878

xor 1st time: 1635017060 ^ 1920234272 = 318771780 (1 xor 2 = new1)
xor 2nd time: 318771780 ^ 1970561909 = 1718907185 (new1 xor 3 = new2)
xor 3rd time: 1718907185 ^ 1763730802 = 257168451 (new2 xor 4 = new3)
xor 4th time: 257168451 ^ 1969627251 = 2050110512 (new3 xor 5 = new4)
xor 5th time: 2050110512 ^ 32878 = 2050143326
